00018 bool compileLine(MavenCompiler* c, string line) {
00019         line = trim(line);
00020         string temp = "";
00021         
00022         // ignore blank lines
00023         if(line == "") return true;
00024         
00025         // clear any line-based buffers
00026         c->objectCheck.clear();
00027         
00028         // get the preliminary keyword to see if we can quickly deal with it
00029         string prelim = "";
00030         for(int i = 0; i < line.length(); ++i) {
00031                 if(line[i] == ' ' || line[i] == '\t' || line[i] == '(') break;
00032                 else prelim += line[i];
00033         }
00034         
00035         // an if statement
00036         string close = "";
00037         if(prelim == "if") {
00038                 keywordIf(c, line, close);
00039                 writeAutoCPPLine(c, close);
00040                 return true;
00041         }
00042         if(prelim == "else") {
00043                 keywordElse(c, line, close);
00044                 writeAutoCPPLine(c, close);
00045                 return true;
00046                 
00047                 /*StringList types;
00048                 MavenMutability mut;
00049                 c->beforeLine = "";
00050                 writeAutoCPPLine(c, "else {" + dissectCode(c, trim(line).substr(4), types, mut, true) + ";}");
00051                 return true;*/
00052         }
00053         
00054         // a loop
00055         if(prelim == "for") {
00056                 keywordFor(c, line, close);
00057                 writeAutoCPPLine(c, close);
00058                 return true;
00059         }
00060         if(prelim == "while") {
00061                 keywordWhile(c, line, close);
00062                 writeAutoCPPLine(c, close);
00063                 return true;
00064         }
00065         
00066         // external lines can be ignored becuase they were taken care of in the mapping phase
00067         if(prelim == "external") return true;
00068         
00069         // import another file
00070         if(prelim == "import") {
00071                 string importpath = trim(line.substr(prelim.length(), line.length()));
00072                 
00073                 // we might need to import all
00074                 if(importpath.find("*") != string::npos)
00075                         return importAll(c, importpath, true);
00076                 else {
00077                         // attach a library
00078                         includeLibraryIfExists(c, importpath);
00079                 }
00080                 
00081                 string importlocation = locateImport(c, importpath);
00082                 if(alreadyImported(c, importlocation))
00083                         return true;
00084                 
00085                 string thisFile = c->currentFile;
00086                 string thisNamespace = c->currentNamespace;
00087                 int thisLine = c->lineNumber;
00088                 c->imports->push(importlocation);
00089                 compileFile(c, importlocation, MAVEN_ONLY_COMPILE);
00090                 writeCPPLine(c, string("} namespace ") + thisNamespace + "{\n");
00091                 return resetCurrent(c, thisFile, thisNamespace, thisLine);
00092         }
00093         
00094         // change the namespace
00095         if(prelim == "namespace") {
00096                 string ns = trim(line.substr(prelim.length(), line.length()));
00097                 if(c->currentNamespace != ns)
00098                         writeCPPLine(c, "} namespace " + ns + "{\n");
00099                 c->currentNamespace = ns;
00100                 return true;
00101         }
00102         
00103         // return line
00104         if(prelim == "return") {
00105                 writeCPPLine(c, objectCheckCPP(c) + keywordReturn(c, line) + ";");
00106                 return true;
00107         }
00108         
00109         // this could be registering a new variable
00110         StringList tokens = smartTokens(line);
00111         if(isRegisteringVariable(c, tokens)) {
00112                 MavenVariable var;
00113                 registerVariable(c, tokens, true, var);
00114                 return true;
00115         }
00116         
00117         // try to dissect it
00118         StringList types;
00119         MavenMutability m;
00120         string newLine = dissectCode(c, line, types, m);
00121         
00122         // pre check for all the objects
00123         newLine = objectCheckCPP(c) + newLine;
00124         
00125         if(c->beforeLine != "")
00126                 writeAutoCPPLine(c, c->beforeLine);
00127         writeAutoCPPLine(c, newLine + ";");
00128         c->beforeLine = "";
00129         
00130         return true;
00131 }
